title: 16/4/20, Got my team 3 dragons, and baron, and we lost...
body: There is no reason why I deserve to lose a game when I did everything. Literally everything, and I lost it cause my idiot feeding mid lamer had to engage, ON A TANK!!!!!!!!!!!, while I was shopping for my last item.... I'm too good for these kids that I get placed with. 5 games win streak that should have been 6 ruined cause of 1 horrible player. I haven't even had over 4 deaths in my past 15 games played....
